caption: This is the recording of a DJ performance. The DJ is performing on a turntable using the scratching technique. The beat in the background has a repeating male vocal sample and a groovy bass sound. The rhythmic background consists of an electronic drum beat. The atmosphere is urban. This piece could be used in the soundtrack of a teenage drama TV series that takes place in the ghettos of a big city.
